footer.about: Excellence in carpentry for your home. Design, security, and custom-made.

seo_intro.title: Your Expert in High-End Interior Doors
seo_intro.text: Explore the 2026 Gad Doors collection. We have selected doors that transcend simple functionality to become true decorative elements. Invisible doors (filomuro), pocket sliding doors, textured wood or gloss lacquer finishes: every model is customizable. Our Italian handles, true jewelry for your home, add the final touch of refinement to your interior.

seo_outro.title: Superior Quality and Guaranteed Durability
seo_outro.text: Investing in a Gad Doors door means choosing elegance for decades. Our doors are water-resistant treated and offer exceptional dimensional stability. Acoustic insulation up to 40dB is available on request for absolute comfort in bedrooms and offices.

seo_content.title: The Art of Installation: Precision & Impeccable Finishes
seo_content.text1: The quality of an interior door depends 50% on its manufacturing and 50% on its installation. At Gad Doors, our installers are carpenters trained in the most demanding installation techniques. We ensure a perfect fit, respect for existing floors, and neat finishes (architraves, joints).
seo_content.text2: Discover below a selection of our recent projects: renovations of designer apartments in Tel Aviv, installation of filomuro doors for modern villas, and office layouts in Jerusalem.

technical.title: Technical Specifications & Performance
features: Acoustic Insulation: Certified noise reduction up to 32dB (40dB option available).
Structure: Reinforced tubular solid core for maximum impact resistance.
Resistance: Water-resistant treatment guaranteeing perfect durability against humidity (ideal for bathrooms).
Finishes: High-density anti-scratch coating, easy to maintain.
Hinges: Invisible 3D adjustable system for perfect alignment.
Lock: Silent magnetic lock as standard for daily comfort.

warranty.title: Warranty & Service
warranty.text: By choosing this model, you benefit from our full warranty on structure and mechanisms. Our after-sales service is at your disposal for any questions regarding the maintenance of your doors.

product.defaultDescription: An exceptional door combining maximum security and contemporary design. Custom finishes available upon request.

seo_content.title: Showroom & Service Area
seo_content.text: Based in the heart of Jerusalem (Aaron Eshkoli 115), we operate throughout the country. Our showroom is designed to allow you to touch materials, test mechanisms, and choose the exact finishes for your future doors. Make an appointment for VIP guidance by one of our interior architects.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Questions about our interior doors or exclusive Italian models? Our expert team is at your disposal.

form.title: Send us a message
form.name: Full Name
form.messagePlaceholder: Describe your need (door type, dimensions, style...)

dashboard.leadsWait: These prospects are waiting to be contacted.

seo.title: Custom Designer Interior Doors | Gad Doors
seo.description: Discover our exclusive collections of interior doors, filomuro doors, and designer handles. Expert installation in Jerusalem and throughout Israel.

seo_section.expertise_title: Expertise & Design: Why Choose Gad Doors?
seo_section.expertise_text: For over 18 years, Gad Doors has been the reference for high-end interior joinery in Israel. Specialists in designer interior doors, we combine Italian style finesse with absolute finishing standards. Each project is a signature: we don't just install doors, we create harmonious living spaces with custom acoustic and aesthetic solutions.
seo_section.services_title: Premium Support from A to Z
seo_section.services_text: Our commitment goes far beyond sales. We offer a turnkey experience (Full Service): home decor consultation, laser measurements, careful delivery, and installation by our own certified carpenters. Your satisfaction is our priority.
seo_section.contact_cta: Contact us for a free quote

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions - Interior Doors
faq.q1: What types of interior doors do you offer?
faq.a1: We offer a complete range of interior doors: classic swing doors, invisible (filomuro) doors, pocket sliding doors, and pivot doors. Our finishes include lacquer (matte/gloss), textured wood, and high-resistance laminate.
faq.q2: Do you operate everywhere in Israel?
faq.a2: Yes, our logistics team covers the entire territory, with a strong presence in Jerusalem, Tel Aviv, Netanya, and Ashdod. We ensure delivery and installation throughout the country.
faq.q3: Do you offer doors with acoustic insulation?
faq.a3: Absolutely. Sound comfort is paramount. We offer doors with solid cores and soundproofing seals allowing noise reduction up to 32dB (and 40dB on request), ideal for bedrooms and offices.

hero.title: The Elegance of Quality
hero.subtitle: Discover our exclusive collection of interior doors. Designed to last, styled to impress.

company.title: Why Choose Us?
company.subtitle: 18 years of experience in importing and installing quality doors

guarantee.title: Solid Warranties
guarantee.water: 7 years warranty against water and termites

process.advice: Personalized advice on doors and colors

productDescriptions.Modello Roma: A timeless handle design, inspired by the grandeur of ancient Rome. Robust finish and ergonomic grip.
productDescriptions.Modello Venezia: Venetian elegance in a handle. Sophisticated curves recalling the canals of the Doge's city.
productDescriptions.Modello Firenze: A tribute to the Renaissance. Artistic handle combining classic aesthetics with modern functionality.
productDescriptions.Modello Verona: Romanticism and solidity. A handle designed to last with a style specifically traversing eras.
productDescriptions.Modello Siena: Inspired by the warm hues of Tuscany. Rustic-chic design for welcoming interiors.
productDescriptions.Modello Pisa: Bold and unique line, bringing a touch of geometric originality to your door.
productDescriptions.Modello Lucca: Refined simplicity. A discreet yet present handle, perfect for minimalist interiors.
productDescriptions.Modello San Gimignano: Structured and imposing design, evoking medieval towers. For a firm and secure grip.
productDescriptions.Modello Positano: The charm of the Amalfi coast. Glossy finish and fluid lines for a Mediterranean touch.
productDescriptions.Modello Amalfi: Luxury and prestige. A handle with meticulous details, ideal for entrance or living room doors.
productDescriptions.Modello Sorrento: Evokes sun and sea. Luminous design that adapts perfectly to bright interiors.
productDescriptions.Modello Capri: Chic and exclusive. A handle distinguished by its natural elegance and noble materials.
productDescriptions.Modello Portofino: Italian glamour at your fingertips. Premium finish to sublimate your doors.
productDescriptions.Modello Bellagio: The pearl of the lake. Subtle reflections, combining tradition and modernity.
productDescriptions.Modello Como: Sleek and sophisticated design, inspired by the tranquility of Lake Como.
productDescriptions.Porte Milano: The pinnacle of modern design. Sharp lines, impeccable finish, the spirit of the fashion capital.
productDescriptions.Porte Torino: Industrial and chic. A robust door with assertive character, ideal for lofts and offices.
productDescriptions.Porte Bologna: Tradition and conviviality. A warm door inviting entry, with reinforced acoustic insulation.
productDescriptions.Porte Genova: Maritime elegance. Fluid lines and increased resistance to humidity.
productDescriptions.Porte Napoli: Vibrant and expressive. A door that doesn't go unnoticed, available in vibrant finishes.
productDescriptions.Porte Palermo: Southern charm. Mediterranean style with subtle ornamental details.
productDescriptions.Porte Bari: Coastal modernity. Fresh and airy design, perfect for bringing in light.
productDescriptions.Porte Catania: Volcanic beauty. Dark and textured finish for a dramatic and elegant look.
productDescriptions.Porte Trieste: Crossroads of cultures. Eclectic design mixing classic and modern influences.
productDescriptions.Porte Padova: Intellectual and structured. Precise geometric lines for an ordered aesthetic.
productDescriptions.Porte Parma: Gastronomic refinement. A door with rich and smooth finishes.
productDescriptions.Porte Modena: Speed and style. Inspired by Italian automotive design, smooth and aerodynamic finish.
productDescriptions.Porte Brescia: Northern solidity. Reinforced door guaranteeing maximum security and insulation.
productDescriptions.Porte Perugia: Heart of Italy. A balanced central design, adapting to all rooms.
productDescriptions.Porte Livorno: Opening to the world. Robust port design with a touch of naval elegance.

productDescriptions.Maniglia Antonio: Classic and timeless. A tribute to Italian tradition, solid and reliable for all doors.
